text:
IMSTRONG.co | React native dev | Bangalore, India | https://www.imstrong.co

ImStrong is a live video-streaming fitness experience that makes it easy and convenient for busy people and homemakers to stay fit from anywhere, at any time.

- We love polyglot programmers/hackers.

- We exist at the intersection of Technology + Media + Fitness

- We are driven by user experince of our product.

- We are delivery & customer focused and no vanity metrics.

We are setting up our core tech team to support growth of our customer base.

If you are a hacker/programmer and wanna know more about us, send across brief about tools you have built + profile of your Github to selvan+hn@imstrong.co

Cheers.
